rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}: Put X meal counters on Banquet Hall.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may remove a meal counter from Banquet Hall. If you do, that spell gains nourish 1. [i](When that creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a colorless Food artifact token with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Contested Cliffs

Cliffs feels like it should be a commander card rather than a main set card. It also arbitrarily gave RG an extra multicolored card in a set where the multicolor pairs are very balanced.
